reference_summary:
Christmas Time in South Park Matt Stone (Director), Trey Parker (Director) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Holidays & Seasonal, Christmas, Comedy ['There\'s no better time of the year than Christmas, especially in South Park. So stop fighting with the family, gather \'round the fire and watch these classic South Park episodes. Join in as the citizens of South Park sing many of everyone\'s favorite holiday classics, like "Mr. Hankey the Christmas Poo" and "Christmas Time in Hell." See the boys bring Christmas to Iraq and learn how hard it is to be a Jew during this holiday season. Christmas is a time when we all can put aside out differences and agree on what the holidays are really about: presents! a Very Crappy Christmas, Mr. Hankey the Christmas Poo, Merry Christmas Charlie Manson!, Mr. Hankey\'s Christmas Classics, Red Sleigh Down, It\'s Christmas in Canada, Woodland Critter Christmas.'] {'Genre': 'Comedy/Television, Animation/Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Full Screen, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Color', 'Contributor': 'Trey Parker, Matt Stone', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 34 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2517', 'Director': 'Matt Stone, Trey Parker', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Full Screen, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Color', 'Run time': '2 hours and 34 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 13, 2007', 'Studio': 'Comedy Central', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} finally caved and bought it when netflix took it off of instant and the wait was just a mess this year.

woodland critter christmas is fantastic. wouldn't be christmas without it. one of the best christmas cartoons ever! {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Čeština', 'Magyar', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['David Semel', 'Daniel Percival', 'Ken Olin', 'Michael Rymer', 'Bryan Spicer', 'Nelson Mccormick', 'Brad Anderson', 'Karyn Kusama', 'Michael Slovis'], 'Producers': ['Ridley Scott', 'David W. profile:
User Profile Summary:

The user displays a robust affinity for comedic and animated content, particularly around holiday themes, as demonstrated by their consistent interactions with seasonal entertainment. Recently, they indicated a preference for content that is not only humorous but also engages with a broader spectrum of adult-oriented themes, as seen in their latest purchase. This suggests a willingness to explore diverse genres beyond traditional animated comedies while still valuing irreverent humor. 

The user likely seeks quality in their viewing experiences, as indicated by their high ratings and thoughtful reviews. Their decision to purchase titles reflects a trend of ensuring accessibility to specific content that may be unavailable on streaming platforms, illustrating a proactive approach to curating their entertainment library.

Additionally, the user seems to appreciate immersive and engaging narratives, as they were willing to invest in a pilot episode that piqued their interest despite regular subscription habits with platforms like Netflix. They are open to exploring varied genres with rich storytelling, reflecting a discerning taste for both quality and engagement in their viewing choices.

Overall, the user enjoys a blend of comedic and complex themes, emphasizing a light-hearted yet sophisticated approach to their entertainment, and values experiences that foster communal enjoyment, especially during seasonal celebrations.
